title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 182-1.18 - Optional services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 182-1.18 - Optional services

State Regulations
(a) A runaway
and homeless youth crisis services program may provide services to homeless
young adults when authorized in the applicable municipality's approved
comprehensive plan. (b) A
non-residential runaway and homeless youth crisis services program may provide
non-residential crisis intervention services to youth in need of such
services. (c) A certified
residential runaway and homeless youth crisis services program may provide
non-residential crisis intervention services and may provide residential
respite services to youth for no more than 21 days, in accordance with
regulations of the office and section
735
of the

Family Court Act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
182-1.18

New

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
